title: MCP Credential Restoration Required
description: After sanitizing .env and .mcp.json files for GitHub sharing, MCP tools were at risk of becoming inaccessible. Successfully restored working credentials from backup files: .env.local.backup and claude-backups/20250711_074751/.mcp.json. This maintained development environment functionality while preserving clean GitHub repository.

solution.description: Successfully restored .env from .env.local.backup and .mcp.json from claude-backups/20250711_074751/.mcp.json. All 15 MCP servers remained functional. Strategy: maintain template files for GitHub while preserving local working credentials through backup restoration.
